actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to terminate the coverage of police officers of the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Terminates the coverage of police officers of the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the coverage of police officers of the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance program.
